ECE Professors

{/* Professors Grid */}
{filteredProfessors.length > 0 ? ( filteredProfessors.map((prof, index) => (

{prof.name}

{prof.email}
{prof.qualification}

{prof.areaOfInterest}

)) ) : (

)}
{/* Results Counter */} {filteredProfessors.length > 0 && (

); }; export default Professors;
